35struct WasmFunction;
36
37// Stores assumptions that a Wasm compilation job made while executing,
38// so they can be checked for continued validity when the job finishes.
39class AssumptionsJournal {
40 public:
41 AssumptionsJournal() = default;
42
43 void RecordAssumption(uint32_t func_index, WellKnownImport status) {
44 imports_.push_back(std::make_pair(func_index, status));
45 }
46
47 const std::vector<std::pair<uint32_t, WellKnownImport>>& import_statuses() {
48 return imports_;
49 }
50
51 bool empty() const { return imports_.empty(); }
52
53 private:
54 // This is not particularly efficient, but it's probably good enough.
55 // For most compilations, this won't hold any entries. If it does
56 // hold entries, their number is expected to be small, because most
57 // functions don't call many imports, and many imports won't be
58 // specially recognized.
59 std::vector<std::pair<uint32_t, WellKnownImport>> imports_;
60};
61
62struct WasmCompilationResult {
63 public:
64 MOVE_ONLY_WITH_DEFAULT_CONSTRUCTORS(WasmCompilationResult);
65
66 enum Kind : int8_t {
67 kFunction,
68 kWasmToJsWrapper,
69 };
70
71 bool succeeded() const { return code_desc.buffer != nullptr; }
72 bool failed() const { return !succeeded(); }
73 explicit operator bool() const { return succeeded(); }
74
75 CodeDesc code_desc;
76 std::unique_ptr<AssemblerBuffer> instr_buffer;
77 uint32_t frame_slot_count = 0;
78 uint32_t ool_spill_count = 0;
79 uint32_t tagged_parameter_slots = 0;
80 base::OwnedVector<uint8_t> source_positions;
81 base::OwnedVector<uint8_t> inlining_positions;
82 base::OwnedVector<uint8_t> protected_instructions_data;
83 base::OwnedVector<uint8_t> deopt_data;
84 std::unique_ptr<AssumptionsJournal> assumptions;
85 std::unique_ptr<LiftoffFrameDescriptionsForDeopt> liftoff_frame_descriptions;
86 int func_index = kAnonymousFuncIndex;
87 ExecutionTier result_tier = ExecutionTier::kNone;
88 Kind kind = kFunction;
89 ForDebugging for_debugging = kNotForDebugging;
90 bool frame_has_feedback_slot = false;
91};
92
93class V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE WasmCompilationUnit final {
94 public:
95 WasmCompilationUnit(int index, ExecutionTier tier, ForDebugging for_debugging)
96 : func_index_(index), tier_(tier), for_debugging_(for_debugging) {
97 DCHECK_IMPLIES(for_debugging != ForDebugging::kNotForDebugging,
98 tier_ == ExecutionTier::kLiftoff);
99 }
100
101 WasmCompilationResult ExecuteCompilation(CompilationEnv*,
102 const WireBytesStorage*, Counters*,
103 WasmFeatures* detected);
104
105 ExecutionTier tier() const { return tier_; }
106 ForDebugging for_debugging() const { return for_debugging_; }
107 int func_index() const { return func_index_; }
108
109 static void CompileWasmFunction(Counters*, NativeModule*,
110 WasmFeatures* detected, const WasmFunction*,
111 ExecutionTier);
112
113 private:
114 WasmCompilationResult ExecuteFunctionCompilation(CompilationEnv*,
115 const WireBytesStorage*,
116 Counters*,
117 WasmFeatures* detected);
118
119 WasmCompilationResult ExecuteImportWrapperCompilation(CompilationEnv*);
120
121 int func_index_;
122 ExecutionTier tier_;
123 ForDebugging for_debugging_;
124};
125
126// {WasmCompilationUnit} should be trivially copyable and small enough so we can
127// efficiently pass it by value.
128ASSERT_TRIVIALLY_COPYABLE(WasmCompilationUnit);
129static_assert(sizeof(WasmCompilationUnit) <= 2 * kSystemPointerSize);
130
131class V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE JSToWasmWrapperCompilationUnit final {
132 public:
133 JSToWasmWrapperCompilationUnit(Isolate* isolate, const FunctionSig* sig,
134 uint32_t canonical_sig_index,
135 const wasm::WasmModule* module, bool is_import,
136 WasmFeatures enabled_features);
137 ~JSToWasmWrapperCompilationUnit();
138
139 // Allow move construction and assignment, for putting units in a std::vector.
140 JSToWasmWrapperCompilationUnit(JSToWasmWrapperCompilationUnit&&)
141 V8_NOEXCEPT = default;
142 JSToWasmWrapperCompilationUnit& operator=(JSToWasmWrapperCompilationUnit&&)
143 V8_NOEXCEPT = default;
144
145 Isolate* isolate() const { return isolate_; }
146
147 void Execute();
148 Handle<Code> Finalize();
149
150 bool is_import() const { return is_import_; }
151 const FunctionSig* sig() const { return sig_; }
152 uint32_t canonical_sig_index() const { return canonical_sig_index_; }
153
154 // Run a compilation unit synchronously.
155 static Handle<Code> CompileJSToWasmWrapper(Isolate* isolate,
156 const FunctionSig* sig,
157 uint32_t canonical_sig_index,
158 const WasmModule* module,
159 bool is_import);
160
161 private:
162 // Wrapper compilation is bound to an isolate. Concurrent accesses to the
163 // isolate (during the "Execute" phase) must be audited carefully, i.e. we
164 // should only access immutable information (like the root table). The isolate
165 // is guaranteed to be alive when this unit executes.
166 Isolate* isolate_;
167 bool is_import_;
168 const FunctionSig* sig_;
169 uint32_t canonical_sig_index_;
170 std::unique_ptr<OptimizedCompilationJob> job_;
171};
172
173inline bool CanUseGenericJsToWasmWrapper(const WasmModule* module,
174 const FunctionSig* sig) {
175#if (V8_TARGET_ARCH_X64 || V8_TARGET_ARCH_ARM64 || V8_TARGET_ARCH_IA32 || \
176 V8_TARGET_ARCH_ARM)
177 // We don't use the generic wrapper for asm.js, because it creates invalid
178 // stack traces.
179 return !is_asmjs_module(module) && v8_flags.wasm_generic_wrapper &&
180 IsJSCompatibleSignature(sig);
181#else
182 return false;
183#endif
184}
185
